messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Hi. I just saw somebody run into the Compass Bank on Thomas and 34th Avenue with a mask on.
34th? We don't know if he's robbing it or not, but we're sitting across the street.
Okay, I'm going to get somebody started. What kind of vehicle did they come in?
Looks like a white, four-door, Scion, or Mitsubishi.
And you said 34th Avenue and Thomas?
Yeah, it's Compass Bank.
Okay.
I don't see anything happening. We could be wrong; we just saw him running in with a mask on. We don't know what's going on.
So he jumped out of a white, what kind of vehicle?
It looks like a four-door, late model, maybe 2007 or 2008.
Did you get a plate number?
No, it's across the street and I'm at a burger shop.
Was it a male or female? Could you tell?
They had a mask on.
What were they wearing?
Gray sweatshirt and gray beanie.
Look, the cars are leaving.
Was it that silver car?
No, that was a lady who got in that one.
Okay, so the person wearing the gray sweatshirt and gray beanie, did the beanie cover their face?
Hang on a second. It looked like a gray bandana around his mouth and over his eyes.
So not a mask?
I don't know for sure. There's a guy waiting in the car.
So there's another person in the white car?
Yeah, there's a person waiting. The police are pulling right behind him right now.
Okay, there's somebody in the white car, correct?
Yeah, he's got a white beanie hat on. I think he's a concerned citizen.
Would you like to speak to the officers when they come out?
No, I don't need to, but you can call me if needed. They're behind the correct car.
Okay, so the officers are watching?
Yes, they're already here.
Oh God, he's got a gun and they're shooting! They're shooting!
So there's shooting now?
Yes, one guy is down. I'm an eyewitness to this whole situation.
Okay. Was there only one person?
I didn't see a second person. He ran to the back of the car and put something in the back seat before getting in.
You did not see a second person enter?
No, it looked like there might have been, but it was probably just the visor.
